Communicating Ideas through Strategy: B Visual Language and Narratives

Building on the foundation established in part A, Communicating Ideas through Strategy: B - Visual Language and Narratives works on the essential elements of visual storytelling and construction of narratives within design. This module emphasizes the significance of visual language in crafting compelling, meaningful and culturally relevant design narratives that resonate with particular target audiences.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Apply a strategic design framework to work.

+  Understand the link between strategy and creativity to deliver successful design concepts.

+  Develop effective communication skills by presenting and articulating strategic design concepts and ideas as part of a group.

+  Evidence understanding of design theory and history through a research essay.
